overview: A modern fairy-tale about Otýlie, a girl who each time she writes something gets all dirty from the ink. One day her teacher wants to clean her with an eradicator and otylie disappears. She is happy to be invisible but due to blots she becomes an ordinary girl again.

production_companies.name: Krátký film Praha – Studio kresleného a loutkového filmu Praha

title: Otylie and 1580 Blots
